ygData.subject: Re: Blood Sabres
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a bloodsabre, and i know the sewers we well as the back of my hand. I see alot of other players getting killed down here, and failing ther Drosco quest
ygData.messageBody:
I am a bloodsabre, and i know the sewers we well as the back of my
hand. I see alot of other players getting killed down here, and
failing ther Drosco quest (Erudites and others don't have good enough
faction for it).

Bloodsabre faction is difficult, as mostly only quests already within
the bloodsabres will raise it. There is a quest called "The Crate"
that will easily raise your faction with the Blood Sabres.

> >I checked into the faction you are trying to raise. Go to
everlore.com and
> >type in Busted Prayer Beads on the search. Click search and then
click
> >busted prayer beads when you see it come up. Check the message
board. The
> >first entry says how he got faction with the Blood Sabres. Thats
all i
> >could
> >find. Wish I could be more of a help. Do you have any secrets,
cheats or
> >whatever that you could share with me? Thankyou in advance for any
help you
> >can give me.
> >
> >Kaino

Blood

like

Beads"

to
